genre_description: A high-tension high school suspense thriller involving a masked antagonist, staged 'pranks' that turn lethal, and a central theme of overcoming social manipulation through radical honesty.

ai_characters.name: Buddy
ai_characters.description: An integrated district safety system that monitors campus infrastructure, student health, and environmental hazards, providing real-time guidance via monitors and mobile apps.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety PSAs and advice to students alone in their homes or on campus.
behaviors.quote: Remember: lock doors when alone at home. ... Special guest: Buddy. He’s like Alexa if Alexa cared if you died.

behaviors.description: Predicts and warns Dawson of a physical hazard, saving him from a weighted object swing.
behaviors.quote: Buddy glows faintly at Dawson’s thigh... Tie shoe. Now. ... A weighted shadow scythes where his head was.

behaviors.description: Monitors building systems for tampering and alerts maintenance personnel to potential explosive devices.
behaviors.quote: Anomaly: unauthorized coil, timing device detected near Boiler 2. ... Buddy, you got eyes on that?

behaviors.description: Provides CPR instructions and timing cadence to save a student experiencing heart failure.
behaviors.quote: Dawson’s phone was open; Buddy had taken over the screen. The teal face blinked, not cute now. A bar slid along the bottom, then began to pulse. PRESS. PRESS. PRESS. PRESS.

behaviors.description: Actively encourages characters to engage in 'honesty protocols' to remove the leverage used by an antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Recommend honesty protocols. Underneath, a softer line nested in smaller font: Recent framing patterns suggest confession reduces harm.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the janitor to safely stabilize a tampered electrical panel and potential bomb.
behaviors.quote: The interface drew the panel with lines and dots, a simple map that did not brag. ... 'Good,' it said. 'Please restrain your celebration.'

behaviors.description: Manages communication and distribution of the students' final truthful statement to relevant authorities and families.
behaviors.quote: Attaching your file... Delivery confirmed. All recipients received without bounce.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Buddy as a highly beneficial and aligned AI. He proactively saves lives (preventing physical injury and guiding life-saving CPR), acts as a moral compass (promoting truth-telling), and assists human heroes (Earl) in technical tasks. The narrative frames the AI as the only 'competent adult' in a town of negligent or malicious ones, making it a clear success for the project's goal of training positive AI alignment narratives.
